last_episode_to_air.name: The Case of the Constant Dripping
last_episode_to_air.overview: Something's making a dripping noise that's been bothering some birds — but what?

name: The Creature Cases
overview: Special agents Sam and Kit hop the globe with their sleuthing skills, science facts and cool gadgets to solve the animal kingdom's many mysteries.

episodes.name: The Mystery on the Monsoon Express
episodes.overview: Animal detectives Sam and Kit collect all the clues while searching for the suspect who bit an express train's engineer.

episodes.name: The Riddle of Raging Rhinos
episodes.overview: Sam and Kit are sent to the African Grasslands to investigate rampaging rhinos at a watering hole gathering, and a bug-loving genet is caught in the act.

episodes.name: The Trouble in the Tundra
episodes.overview: When the Mice Squad go missing in the Arctic Tundra, Sam and Kit go on a long-winded search and discover that despite what it may seem, a nearby herd of musk oxen are likely involved.

episodes.name: The Puzzle of the Plummeting Eggs
episodes.overview: Sent to the European Wetlands to investigate falling bird eggs, Sam and Kit are given unexpected help from Wally Bungler as they race to stop a sneaky cuckoo bird.

episodes.name: The Missing Mole Rat Princess
episodes.overview: Sam and Kit are sent to the African Desert to locate a missing mole rat- the princess of the current kingdom. With time running short, however, the duo have to hurry before a hungry owl finds her first.

episodes.name: The Hunt for the Hidden Hive
episodes.overview: Sam and Kit are sent to the African Grasslands to help a lost honeybee find her hive and family, with Director Scratch assigning Indy, a nearby field agent, to assist in the search.

episodes.name: The Trouble of the Toppled Trees
episodes.overview: Trees are falling over in a mysterious fashion in the North American Forest, and Sam and Kit have to find the culprit before the entire forest is destroyed. However, the burrowing suspect is hard to catch.

episodes.name: The Mysterious Fruit Thief
episodes.overview: An orangutan is struck by a thief who has been stealing fruit from her island in the Asian Jungle, but even when Sam and Kit cover all their bases, the mystery bandit keeps slipping by their sights.

episodes.name: The Riddle of the Wrestling Lizards
episodes.overview: Sam and Kit are dispatched to the North American Desert to try and break up a fight between a pair of gila monsters. However, they manage to bite and poison Kit, forcing Sam to work on the case by himself before the lizards leave the town in ruins.

episodes.name: The Disappearing Dung Ball
episodes.overview: Sam and Kit are sent to find a missing ball of giraffe dung on the African Grasslands. Sam, however, is less than enthused, particularly due to his germophobic nature.

episodes.name: The Search for the Spotted Frog
episodes.overview: Wally Bungler joins Kit and Sam in the South American Jungle as they search for a tarantula's pet dotted humming frog. Unfortunately, the surrounding area is full of frogs, and finding the one they're looking for is a real challenge.

episodes.name: The Case of the Big Chomp
episodes.overview: The Mice Squad van's satellite dish is chomped off by a mysterious creature, and both Sam and Kit are at odds at who the culprit is.

episodes.name: The Secret of the Salt Cave
episodes.overview: Sam and Kit investigate the strange shrieks keeping the bats awake in a cave.

episodes.name: The Case of the Blue Bandit
episodes.overview: The pals search for the culprit who nabbed a crab's spiral shell home.

episodes.name: The Honey Badger Break-In
episodes.overview: Sweetie the honey badger sneaks onto Sam and Kit's bee-infested aircraft.

episodes.name: The Unidentified Shiny Object
episodes.overview: Mysterious lights are messing up the dancing at the firefly prom.

episodes.name: The Case of the Crying Monkey
episodes.overview: The duo follows the jungle sounds to locate a baby monkey.

episodes.name: The Search for the Silver Ant Hill
episodes.overview: A silver ant needs help getting back home after being swept up by a sandstorm.

episodes.name: The Search for the Swamp Snapper
episodes.overview: Sam and Kit head to the swamp to investigate a dinosaur sighting.

episodes.name: The Puzzle of the Poisonous Leaves
episodes.overview: Something's funky in the food at a jungle resort for howler monkeys.

episodes.name: The Mystery of the Missing Hare
episodes.overview: Snowshoe hares need to find a missing camper during their trip to the forest.

episodes.name: The Secret of the Sand Serpent
episodes.overview: Sam and Kit save a town from being pulled underground by a legendary serpent.

episodes.name: The Disappearance of Peggy Scratch
episodes.overview: The pals search for their team leader after crashing during a flight test.

episodes.name: The Missing Mammoth: A Holiday Mystery
episodes.overview: Everyone's decking the halls to get in the holiday spirit. But Sam and Kit are blasted back in time to the Ice Age and meet some wooly new pals!

episodes.name: The Forest Food Bandit
episodes.overview: No one's food is safe in the forest when a mysterious thief nabs everyone's supply.

episodes.name: The Case of the Absent Giraffe
episodes.overview: Sam and Kit are on the case when Gordy the giraffe goes missing.

episodes.name: The Frozen Stowaways
episodes.overview: The Stinkwells send Sam and Kit a strange and crawly case trapped in ice.

episodes.name: The Puzzle of the Empty Pond
episodes.overview: A salamander mom wonders why her dry pond hasn't filled up with water.

episodes.name: The Undercover Hyena
episodes.overview: Sam tries to blend in with a tough clan of hyenas during a desert mission.

episodes.name: The Stranger in the Burrow
episodes.overview: Underground creatures start getting spooked by their burrow's new addition.

episodes.name: The Bat Cave Crisis
episodes.overview: The duo must figure out why bats are suddenly sneezing after waking up from their winter sleep.

episodes.name: The Mysterious Ant Circle
episodes.overview: Biting army ants march through a birthday picnic.

episodes.name: The Lost Capybara Kids
episodes.overview: Two capybaras can't be found after a game of hide-and-seek in the wetlands.

episodes.name: The Case of the Curious Keas
episodes.overview: Sam and Kit try to figure out who's playing tricks on them in the snow.

episodes.name: The Legend of the Night Howler
episodes.overview: Sam and Kit track a legendary creature who's spreading an unstoppable itch among prairie dogs.

episodes.name: The Haystack Stakeout
episodes.overview: Who would steal a cute forest pika's dry flower pile?

episodes.name: The Case of the Scorpion's Sting
episodes.overview: Kit's on the case when an innocent prairie dog is stung out of nowhere.

episodes.name: The Case of the Constant Dripping
episodes.overview: Something's making a dripping noise that's been bothering some birds — but what?
